con:testCase.name: Good Case-CAMT054-MOW-Verification
con:testCase.con:description:
Based on requirements in us: https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-3755
This test-case tests Maintenance of Workflows for the below JobActions : PPIT_PREPARE_CLAWBACK PROCESS_RETURN_CAMT054 PROCESS_FEE_CAMT054 PROCESS_CREDIT_CAMT054
Note: Execution only in suite after all test-cases before are executed.
Test-scenario:
Get MAX(ID) of TASK and CAMT05400102_INPUT_ENTRY. Data Creation by calling the disabled Test case : TestCase-DEV-Pain008-CAMT054-Debit WorkFlow maintenance verification for the JobActions Date Source and Loop to verify the Workflow maintenance for the above JobActions Execute the operation getWorkflowMaintenanceData with the required job name and valid date range. Number of modified entries should be 0 before the update Update the Status and the error code for the transaction based on the data from DataSource step. Execute the operation getWorkflowMaintenanceData with the required job name from Data Source step. Number of modified entries count should be 1 in the response. Simulation of resetting as in GUI â€“ Execute operation resetWorkflowMaintenanceData with job name and valid comments. Success response should be received. Execute the operation getWorkflowMaintenanceData with the required job name and valid date range. Number of modified entries shown as 0 in the response. Validate that the status and error codes are reset in the database as per the DataSource.
Acceptance criteria:
Tests are implemented, executed and passed. All validation from points before are presented for review in review meeting. MOW for the working as reset from DRC GUI.

con:config.con:query: UPDATE TASK SET CREATION_DATE = to_date('${=java.time.LocalDateTime.now().format(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern( "yyyy-MM-dd 00:00:00"))}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), LAST_PROPAGATION_DATE = to_date('${=java.time.LocalDateTime.now().format(java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern( "yyyy-MM-dd 00:00:00"))}', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE TASK_TYPE_ID = 3 AND ID > ${#TestSuite#MAXIDTASK}
SELECT * FROM CAMT05400102_INPUT_ENTRY WHERE ID > ${#TestSuite#MAXIDCAMT} ORDER BY ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAMT05400102_INPUT_ENTRY SET DRC_STATUS = '${Data Source-CAMT054-JOB#DRCStatus}', DRC_ERROR_CODE = ${Data Source-CAMT054-JOB#DRCCode} WHERE ID = ${Properties-ID#ID}
